name: Bollie's Adventure
description:
I am currently developing Mario 64 SQUARED, and I only made this to test some things in MMF2 and to figure out how to make holding the jump button make your jump longer. Arrow keys to move, space bar to jump... enjoy! And look out for Mario 64 SQUARED, an 8 bit remixed version of Super Mario 64!

Donations are not required or requested, but helpful ;).
